organic.title: Multiplayer in Anno 1800 | Ubisoft Help
organic.snippet: From the main menu, select ''Multiplayer''. · Choose ''Host New Game''. · Select ''+'' to invite other players or add an AI opponent. · Choose ''Start Game''.

organic.title: Playing co-op in Watch Dogs 2 | Ubisoft Help
organic.snippet: To start a game in online mode, bring up your phone and select Multiplayer. You can then choose from the following modes: 2 Player Co-op. 4 Player Party.
